name: The Truth Hero
description:
Lead Designer and Project Manager: Jaynel Dugos
Lead Programmer and Sound Designer: Pierre Chua
Lead Artist: Justine Fabian
AI and Mechanics Programmer: Paolo Arevalo and Marvin Mendoza

Adviser: Johndale Alfred Julian

The country is in chaos. Almost everyone’s minds are clouded, unable to distinguished to what is real or not. A team of programmers has developed a false information detecting program to find out where is the source of this misinformation.

Now it’s up to you as the Truth Hero to uncover the truth and free everyone from this slavery of lies and falsehood.

Research and Documentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1EUXMhZW4fuSuLG-hWhbqSTHeT3ni7CUv/view?usp=shari...
